æ¶ˆæ¯é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å†…å®¹å¾ˆä¸°å¯Œï¼Œç›®å‰æˆ‘å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ˜¯kafkaï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç¬¬ä¸€ç¯‡çŒ®ç»™æˆ‘çš„kafkaï¼Œåç»­æˆ‘ä»¬ç»§ç»­é’»ç ”ä¸‹ï¼ŒRocketMQã€ActiveMQã€‚
kafkaçš„åŸç”Ÿå†™æ³•ï¼Œä¸ç¹çï¼Œç›´æ¥çœ‹è§é…ç½®é¡¹å°±ğŸ‘Œï¼Œå¦‚æœä½ æ˜¯åˆšå…¥é—¨å¤§æ•°æ®æˆ–è€…æ˜¯åˆšæ¥æ‰‹kafkaçš„è¯éš¾å…æœ‰è’™åœˆçš„æ„Ÿè§‰ï¼ŒButï¼ï¼ï¼è¿™ä¸è¦ç´§ï¼Œå…ˆè’™åœ¨å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œåç»­ä½ æ¥è§¦å¤šäº†å¤§æ•°æ®çš„ä¸œè¥¿ï¼Œå°±ä¼šå‘ç°ï¼Œå¾ˆå¤šç»„ä»¶ç”¨äº†å¾ˆå¤šçš„é…ç½®é¡¹ï¼ŒåŠ è½½è¿›é…ç½®é¡¹å°±å¯ä»¥ç”¨äº†ã€‚å½“ç„¶æˆ‘è¯´çš„è¿˜æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒåŸç”Ÿçš„å†™æ³•ï¼Œåˆšåˆšå†™å®Œäº†ä¸€éHBaseçš„åŸç”Ÿï¼Œä¸€æ—¶è„±ç¦»ä¸å‡ºåº•å±‚çš„èŒƒå›´å“ˆå“ˆå“ˆã€‚

å¿ƒçµé¸¡æ±¤ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼šåˆšå…¥èŒçš„å°ç™½é‡åˆ°ä¸ä¼šçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œç”šè€…è¢«æ‰¹è¯„ï¼Œåƒä¸‡ä¸è¦æ°”é¦ï¼Œè§‰å¾—è‡ªå·±ä¸é€‚åˆå¹²è¿™ä¸ªã€‚è¡Œä¸šæ²¡æœ‰ä¸é€‚åˆçš„ï¼Œåªæœ‰å¹²çš„å¼€ä¸å¼€å¿ƒã€‚åšæŒä¸€ä¸‹æ²¡å‡†ä½ å°±æœ‰å°éª„å‚²äº†å‘¢ï¼ŸåºŸè¯å°‘è¯´ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ’¸ç 

ç”Ÿäº§è€…

public class KafkaProvider{

private final Producer<String, String> producer;public final static String TOPIC = "TEST-TOPIC";public KafkaProvider(){    Properties props = new Properties();//é…ç½®é¡¹ï¼è¿™è¡Œä»£ç æ˜¯kafkaçš„æºå¤´ã€‚    props.put("bootstrap.servers", "127.0.0.1:9092");//zookeeperåœ°å€ï¼Œé›†ç¾¤ç”¨é€—å·åˆ†éš”      //è¿™é‡Œå¦‚æœä¸ç†Ÿæ‚‰çš„åŒå­¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥çœ‹çœ‹kafaçš„æ¶æ„å›¾ã€‚æ¯ä¸€ä¸ª      ![](kafkaæ¶æ„.jpg)    props.put("acks", "all");//è®°å½•å®Œæ•´æäº¤ï¼Œæœ€æ…¢ä½†æ˜¯æœ€å¤§å¯èƒ½çš„æŒä¹…åŒ–    props.put("retries", 3);//è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥çš„é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°    props.put("batch.size", 16384);//batchå¤§å°    props.put("linger.ms", 1);// é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µå³ä½¿ç¼“å†²åŒºæœ‰å‰©ä½™çš„ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šç«‹å³å‘é€è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´ç”¨æ¥ç­‰å¾…ä»è€Œå°†ç¼“å†²åŒºå¡«çš„æ›´å¤šï¼Œå•ä½ä¸ºæ¯«ç§’ï¼Œproducerå‘é€æ•°æ®ä¼šå»¶è¿Ÿ1msï¼Œå¯ä»¥å‡å°‘å‘é€åˆ°kafkaæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®    props.put("buffer.memory", 33554432);// æä¾›ç»™ç”Ÿäº§è€…ç¼“å†²å†…å­˜æ€»é‡    props.put("key.serializer", "org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringSerializer");//å†™è¯æ–¹å¼    props.put("value.serializer", "org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringSerializer");    //ç”Ÿæˆç”Ÿäº§è€…    producer =  new KafkaProducer<String, String>(props);}//åœ¨å…¥å£å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨å³å¯ï¼Œå…·ä½“åº”ç”¨æƒ…å½¢æ ¹æ®é¡¹ç›®å®é™…æ¥çœ‹public void producer(){    int messageNo = 1;    final int COUNT =1000;    while (1){        String num = String.valueOf(messageNo);        String data = "hello kafka message:" + num;        ProducerRecord record = new ProducerRecord(TOPIC,data);        producer.send(record);        messageNo ++ ;        System.out.println(messageNo);        try {            sleep(1000);        } catch ( InterruptedException e ) {            e.printStackTrace();        }    }}

}

æ¶ˆè´¹è€…

public class KafkaConsumer {
private final Consumer consumer ;
public final static String TOPIC = â€œTEST-TOPICâ€;
private ExecutorService executors;

public KafkaCon(){    Properties props = new Properties();    props.put("bootstrap.servers", "127.0.0.1:9092");//zkåŒç”Ÿäº§è€…ä¸€è‡´    props.put("group.id", "2");//åˆ†ç»„Idï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼    props.put("enable.auto.commit", "true");//è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯å¯¹offsetçš„æ“ä½œï¼Œæœ‰äº›éœ€è¦å¯¹offsetæ›´åŠ ç²¾å‡†çš„å¤„ç†ï¼Œéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œæ‰‹åŠ¨æäº¤ã€‚    props.put("auto.commit.interval.ms", "1000");    props.put("session.timeout.ms", "30000");    props.put("key.deserializer", "org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringDeserializer");    props.put("value.deserializer", "org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringDeserializer");    consumer = new KafkaConsumer<String, String>(props);    consumer.subscribe(Arrays.asList(TOPIC));    execute(10);}public void execute(int workerNum) {    executors = new ThreadPoolExecutor(workerNum, workerNum, 0L, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS,            new ArrayBlockingQueue(1000), new ThreadPoolExecutor.CallerRunsPolicy());    Thread t = new Thread(new Runnable(){//å¯åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ªå­çº¿ç¨‹æ¥ç›‘å¬kafkaæ¶ˆæ¯        @Override        public void run(){            while (true) {                ConsumerRecords<String, String> records = consumer.poll(200);                for (final ConsumerRecord record : records) {                    System.out.println("ã€Kafkaã€‘ç›‘å¬åˆ°kafkaçš„TOPICã€" + record.topic() + "ã€‘çš„æ¶ˆæ¯");                    System.out.println("ã€Kafkaã€‘æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ï¼š" + record.value());                    executors.submit(new ConsumerWorker(record));                }            }        }});    t.start();}

}

è¿™æ˜¯æ ‡å‡†çš„ä¸€ä¸ªkafkaé…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç”Ÿäº§å®æˆ˜ä¸­çš„åº”ç”¨å¾ˆç®€å•ï¼Œåƒä¸‡è®°ä½å‡ ä¸ªå…³é”®è¯ï¼šproduceã€consumerã€topicã€group.idã€partitionã€brokerï¼Œschemaçš„å«ä¹‰ï¼Œä¸»è¦è¿˜æ˜¯ç†è§£å§ã€‚
æå‡ ä¸ªé—®é¢˜å“ˆï¼Ÿå¦‚æœä½ æƒ³å¤šä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è€…æ¶ˆè´¹ä¸€ä¸ªtopicæ€ä¹ˆåŠï¼Ÿpartionä¸­çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æ˜¯é¡ºåºçš„ï¼Œå¤šä¸ªpartioné—´çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å‘¢ï¼Ÿ

entry.title: java ä»£ç è¯·æ±‚URlæ ·ä¾‹
entry.content:
ä¹ æƒ¯äº†åœ¨å¼€å‘ä¸­è¿ç”¨å·¥å…·ï¼ˆpostmanç­‰ï¼‰è°ƒè¯•æ¥å£ï¼Œå‡ ä¹å¿˜äº†ç”¨ä»£ç å¯ä»¥æ›´å¥½çš„å¤„ç†å®é™…æƒ…å†µã€‚

Demoæ ·ä¾‹
/**

 * å‘é€postè¯·æ±‚ * @param url  è·¯å¾„ * @param jsonObject  å‚æ•°(jsonç±»å‹) * @param encoding ç¼–ç æ ¼å¼ * @return * @throws ParseException * @throws IOException */public static String send(String url, JSONObject jsonObject,String encoding) throws ParseException, IOException{    String body = "";    //åˆ›å»ºhttpclientå¯¹è±¡    CloseableHttpClient client = HttpClients.createDefault();    //åˆ›å»ºpostæ–¹å¼è¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡    HttpPost httpPost = new HttpPost(url);    //è£…å¡«å‚æ•°    StringEntity s = new StringEntity(jsonObject.toString(), "utf-8");    //å‚æ•°ä½“æœ‰æŒ‰è¦æ±‚ä¹Ÿè¦è¿›è¡ŒContent-typeèµ‹å€¼    s.setContentType("application/json");    s.setContentEncoding(new BasicHeader(HTTP.CONTENT_TYPE,            "application/json"));    //è®¾ç½®å‚æ•°åˆ°è¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡ä¸­    httpPost.setEntity(s);    System.out.println("è¯·æ±‚åœ°å€ï¼š"+url);

// System.out.println(â€œè¯·æ±‚å‚æ•°ï¼šâ€+nvps.toString());

    //è®¾ç½®headerä¿¡æ¯    //æŒ‡å®šæŠ¥æ–‡å¤´ã€Content-typeã€‘ã€ã€User-Agentã€‘é€‰æ‹©å…¶ä¸€å°±ok    httpPost.setHeader("Content-type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded");    httpPost.setHeader("Content-type", "application/json");    httpPost.setHeader("User-Agent", "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 5.0; Windows NT; DigExt)");    //æ‰§è¡Œè¯·æ±‚æ“ä½œï¼Œå¹¶æ‹¿åˆ°ç»“æœï¼ˆåŒæ­¥é˜»å¡ï¼‰    CloseableHttpResponse response = client.execute(httpPost);    //è·å–ç»“æœå®ä½“    HttpEntity entity = response.getEntity();    if (entity != null) {        //æŒ‰æŒ‡å®šç¼–ç è½¬æ¢ç»“æœå®ä½“ä¸ºStringç±»å‹        body = EntityUtils.toString(entity, encoding);    }    EntityUtils.consume(entity);    //é‡Šæ”¾é“¾æ¥    response.close();    return body;}
